metadata.title: CVE-2023-38317 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OpenNDS before 10.1.3. It fails to sanitize thenetwork interface name entry in the configuration file, allowing attackersthat have direct or indirect access to this file to execute arbitrary OScommands.

criterions.comment: opennds package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
